author.name: Tudor Girba
author.description: Software environmentalist | CEO @feenkcom

html:
When a system is not testable, stop and make it testable.

When a system is not deployable, stop and make it deployable.

Both challenged the status quo in their time. The time has come for a new challenge:

When a system is not explainable, stop and make it explainable.

html: The main altarpiece of the Seville Cathedral is a gigantic work of art that was begun by the Spanish-Flemish sculptor Pedro Dancart in 1481. It is considered the largest altarpiece in Christianity. It was carried out over more than 80 years, being completely finished in 1564. ✨ https://t.co/dI9xggiCbD

html:
So I started with a list of priority topics and non-priority topics.

Week one, I had 4 priority topics, and I read 5 minutes on each topic each day (20 minutes reading)

Week two: 4 priority topics, reading 10 minutes per topic (40 minutes reading)

and so on....

author.name: TfT Hacker - Exploring Tools for Thought and PKM
author.description: Exploring Tools for Thought space and PKM, with focus on tools like Obsidian, Tana, Craft, LogSeq, RemNote, AthensResearch, OneNote, etc https://t.co/GyMiAikIl1

html: EXAMPLE: I have to read a lot of material for work. The problem is time.\n\nHow do I not only get through all the reading material but extract useful "things" from that material? I mean, what is the point of reading if you don't benefit from it?

author.name: Linus
author.description: thought & craft · ex @replit @hackclub @dormroomfund

html:
Back in 2015 our industry was like "what if we forced everyone to perform every menial and intellectual task through this narrow pipe called chat?"

Now, we're like "what if we forced everyone to do every little task through this narrow pipe called prompting?"

No! Do better!

author.name: Linus
author.description: thought & craft · ex @replit @hackclub @dormroomfund

html: If you don't heed this warning, you end up with a Notion that has 10 copies of every piece of information, 4 of which contradict each other and only 2 of which reliably surface on searches.
